resourceTemplates.name: Current time by time zone
resourceTemplates.description: Get the current date and time for a specific IANA time zone (e.g., Europe/Amsterdam).

resourceTemplates.name: Current time by coordinates
resourceTemplates.description: Get the current date and time for a given latitude and longitude.

resourceTemplates.name: Current time by IP address
resourceTemplates.description: Get the current date and time for the timezone of a given IPv4 address. If not provided, uses the caller's IP.

resourceTemplates.name: Time zone info by name
resourceTemplates.description: Get detailed info for a specific IANA time zone (offset, DST, etc).

resourceTemplates.name: Time zone info by coordinates
resourceTemplates.description: Get detailed info for a time zone at a given latitude and longitude.

resourceTemplates.name: Time zone info by IP address
resourceTemplates.description: Get detailed info for a time zone at a given IPv4 address. If not provided, uses the caller's IP.

resourceTemplates.name: Day of the week from date
resourceTemplates.description: Get the weekday name (e.g., Monday) for a date (yyyy-MM-dd).

resourceTemplates.name: Day of the year from date
resourceTemplates.description: Get the day number (1-366) of the year for a date (yyyy-MM-dd).
